functionDecorators.name: isWhitelisted
functionDecorators.description: Returns true if the provided listingHash is whitelisted.

parameterDecorators.name: _listingHash
parameterDecorators.description: The listingHash whose status is to be examined.

functionDecorators.name: withdraw
functionDecorators.description: Allows the owner of a listingHash to decrease their unstaked deposit.

parameterDecorators.name: _listingHash
parameterDecorators.description: A listingHash msg.sender is the owner of.

parameterDecorators.name: _amount
parameterDecorators.description: The number of ERC20 tokens to withdraw from the unstaked deposit.

functionDecorators.name: exit
functionDecorators.description: Allows the owner of a listingHash to remove the listingHash from the whitelist Returns all tokens to the owner of the listingHash.

parameterDecorators.name: _listingHash
parameterDecorators.description: A listingHash msg.sender is the owner of.

functionDecorators.name: challengeExists
functionDecorators.description: Returns true if the application/listingHash has an unresolved challenge.

parameterDecorators.name: _listingHash
parameterDecorators.description: The listingHash whose status is to be examined.

functionDecorators.name: deposit
functionDecorators.description: Allows the owner of a listingHash to increase their unstaked deposit.

parameterDecorators.name: _listingHash
parameterDecorators.description: A listingHash msg.sender is the owner of.

parameterDecorators.name: _amount
parameterDecorators.description: The number of ERC20 tokens to increase a user's unstaked deposit.

functionDecorators.name: canBeWhitelisted
functionDecorators.description: Determines whether the given listingHash can be whitelisted.

parameterDecorators.name: _listingHash
parameterDecorators.description: The listingHash whose status is to be examined.

functionDecorators.name: listingExists
functionDecorators.description: Check if a listing exists in the registry by checking that its owner is not zero Since all solidity mappings have every key set to zero, we check that the address of the creator isn't zero.

functionDecorators.name: challengeCanBeResolved
functionDecorators.description: Determines whether voting has concluded in a challenge for a given listingHash. Throws if no challenge exists.

parameterDecorators.name: _listingHash
parameterDecorators.description: A listingHash with an unresolved challenge.

functionDecorators.name: claimReward
functionDecorators.description: Called by a voter to claim their reward for each completed vote. Someone must call updateStatus() before this can be called.

parameterDecorators.name: _challengeID
parameterDecorators.description: The PLCR pollID of the challenge a reward is being claimed for.

parameterDecorators.name: _salt
parameterDecorators.description: The salt of a voter's commit hash in the given poll.

functionDecorators.name: apply
functionDecorators.description: Allows a user to start an application. Takes tokens from user and sets apply stage end time.

parameterDecorators.name: _listingHash
parameterDecorators.description: The hash of a potential listing a user is applying to add to the registry.

parameterDecorators.name: _amount
parameterDecorators.description: The number of ERC20 tokens a user is willing to potentially stake.

parameterDecorators.name: _data
parameterDecorators.description: Extra data relevant to the application. Think IPFS hashes.

functionDecorators.name: updateStatus
functionDecorators.description: Updates a listingHash's status from 'application' to 'listing' or resolves a challenge if one exists.

parameterDecorators.name: _listingHash
parameterDecorators.description: The listingHash whose status is being updated.

functionDecorators.name: appWasMade
functionDecorators.description: Returns true if apply was called for this listingHash.

parameterDecorators.name: _listingHash
parameterDecorators.description: The listingHash whose status is to be examined.

parameterDecorators.name: _challengeID
parameterDecorators.description: The challengeID to query.

parameterDecorators.name: _voter
parameterDecorators.description: The voter whose claim status to query for the provided challengeID.

functionDecorators.name: voterReward
functionDecorators.description: Calculates the provided voter's token reward for the given poll.

parameterDecorators.name: _voter
parameterDecorators.description: The address of the voter whose reward balance is to be returned.

parameterDecorators.name: _challengeID
parameterDecorators.description: The pollID of the challenge a reward balance is being queried for.

parameterDecorators.name: _salt
parameterDecorators.description: The salt of the voter's commit hash in the given poll.

functionDecorators.name: determineReward
functionDecorators.description: Determines the number of tokens awarded to the winning party in a challenge.

parameterDecorators.name: _challengeID
parameterDecorators.description: The challengeID to determine a reward for.

functionDecorators.name: challenge
functionDecorators.description: Starts a poll for a listingHash which is either in the apply stage or already in the whitelist. Tokens are taken from the challenger and the applicant's deposits are locked.

parameterDecorators.name: _listingHash
parameterDecorators.description: The listingHash being challenged, whether listed or in application.

parameterDecorators.name: _deposit
parameterDecorators.description: The deposit with which the listing is challenge (used to be `minDeposit`).

parameterDecorators.name: _data
parameterDecorators.description: Extra data relevant to the challenge. Think IPFS hashes.
